name: Goldar
description: Goldar is a lion-faced, griffin-themed knight who is the second-in-command for both Rita Repulsa and Lord Zedd.

name: Lord Zedd
description: Lord Zedd is a major villain from the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers series and recurring through Power Rangers Zeo and Power Rangers in Space.

name: Rita Repulsa
description: Rita Repulsa is an evil humanoid alien witch bent on galactic domination.
